website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok ARDARA was considered a very comfortable pair of everyday walking shoes. It was also described as durable and affordable. However, though the lightweight and breathable upper pleased many persons, some felt that it was too soft to hold their foot securely. But in the end, it was deemed as decent walking footwear by many purchasers.
pros: A vast majority of owners adored how comfortable the Reebok ARDARA was for everyday walking
A large number of people enjoyed the lightweight nature of the trainer
The price of the merchandise was affordable, according to drives of consumers
The upper fit like a glove which numerous testers loved
A lot of individuals liked that their feet did not get hot while wearing this product because of the breathable upper
Multiple users cited that this model helped relieve their foot, leg and back pains
This pair of Reebok walking shoes was regarded as durable by several reviewers
cons: A significant number of folks criticized the upper material for being too thin as it did not hold the foot properly
A few wearers wished the underfoot cushioning was more comfortable because their feet felt tired and painful at the end of the day

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I just got them in and have put about 10miles on them so far. So far they are holding up good. I walk about 5 miles a day so hopefully they will last. Very comfortable. If you have a wide foot ,I do not recommend these shoes. They are very very narrow. I have narrow feet and they fit me good, but I even had to losen the laces up a lot to make them fit. Update: my feet have started to really hurt in these. If you walk a lot, I don't recommend. The middle of my feet hurt so bad after I take a long walk
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a great price and the shoe goes with alot of outfits, they look almost van like especially with Jean's but are way more comfortable than Van's. Lightweight, good food support and arch support and comfortable if your in your feet for 8-12 straight hours like I am for my job. Would recommend and would by again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Actually it’s her second pair. Couldn’t get her to get new shoes , her old ones had holes, til I found her exact pair on amazon. She was all for getting new pair then. They look great. She said they make her want to keep walking. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have walked 6 to 8 hours each day since I received these. I always wear Reebok shoes so I knew these would be good. They are well cushioned to help my joints on my 2 hour walks up and down hills. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: goldenlover

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is there isn’t much room for your big toe. I did a half size up and think I should’ve done a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Pokorski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While I love the shoe & design, the upper portion near to tie the shoe is cut to narrow. Even loosening the tie & laces does not help. Sadly I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: My mom was very pleased, With the style and comfort of the walking ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom was very pleased,With the style and comfort of the walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: marcuswilson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is lighter than running shoes and very comfortable. Perfect for gym exercise class
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting light weight shoe. Great for walking my dogs. Would buy again Cannot beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Audell

customer_reviews.title: Best Walking Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great comfortable walking shoe. It’s definitely my go to now!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The worst shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: They are out of style and they are not sewed correctly inside so it hits the top of your foot. It irritates my foot where it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe just a little big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 but these could have been a 7 easy
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia z.

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these shoes on sale at Sears and have worn them for a couple of years now. I absolutely love them but have worn them so much that I have to buy another pair. So I'm buying the exact same pair again (different color though). These shoes are great for wide feet, they don't squish your toes together. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Ardara Training Shoe
product_meta.description: Get sleek performance style to match every workout with the Adara cross-training shoe from Reebok..
feature_bullets: Breathable knit shoe conforms to the shape of your foot, offering a natural feel
